ch0284_41_seki/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re looking
sharp today, as usual!
ch0284_41_seki/0101_0701_02_10:
I don’t think I look too shabby myself!
This outfit’s pretty good, huh?
ch0284_41_seki/7101_0701_01_10:
People and Pokémon can liven up a place
just by changing their outfit.
ch0284_41_seki/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s important to remember that decorating a
space can truly make your time there more
enjoyable.
ch0284_41_seki/7102_0701_01_10:
As time passes, our appearances can
change.
ch0284_41_seki/7102_0701_02_10:
Thus, this moment is precious! Let’s take
some photos to remember it by!
ch0284_41_seki/7103_0701_01_10:
If you want to look good, you’ve got to start
with your grooming.
ch0284_41_seki/7103_0701_02_10:
Hairstyles are most important! They can truly
change how you look compared to others.
ch0284_41_seki/7103_0701_03_10:
Uh...at least, that’s what Arezu says.
If you’re thinking of changing your look,
maybe chat with her.
ch0284_41_seki/7104_0701_01_10:
When you’re part of a group, it can be nice
to express yourself by wearing something
that stands out.
ch0284_41_seki/7104_0701_02_10:
But it’s also kind of nice when everyone
matches!
ch0284_41_seki/7104_0701_03_10:
Matching uniforms can strengthen your
feeling of camaraderie!
ch0284_41_seki/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m always
grateful when you’re around!
ch0284_41_seki/7105_0701_02_10: Oh, was that too forward? Sorry.
ch0284_41_seki/7105_0701_03_10:
I think it’s best to express thanks directly,
without any fluff.
ch0284_41_seki/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, good timing! I have something for you.
ch0284_41_seki/1701_0702_01_10:
I didn’t expect you to find me first, but I’m
glad you saved me the time!
ch0284_41_seki/2501_0701_01_10:
There’s a day for showing others your
gratitude...
ch0284_41_seki/2501_0701_02_10:
Makes me wonder if I’ve been properly
thanking all the Diamond Clan members...
ch0284_41_seki/2501_0701_03_10:
I guess I’d best act on that thought,
before I forget!
ch0284_41_seki/2501_0701_04_10:
Next time I see my clan members, I’ll be
sure to tell them how thankful I am!
ch0284_41_seki/2501_0702_01_10:
The only reason I’m doing OK as a new clan
leader is because everyone around me
helps out.
ch0284_41_seki/2501_0702_02_10: I really ought to thank them!
ch0284_41_seki/2511_0701_01_10:
Every time I encounter new cultures or
values, they do confuse me a bit.
ch0284_41_seki/2511_0701_02_10:
But how I see the world changes depending
on whether I choose to accept them.
ch0284_41_seki/2511_0701_03_10:
I view Pasio a lot differently now compared
to when I first got here.
ch0284_41_seki/2511_0702_01_10: This era continues to fascinate me!
ch0284_41_seki/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ll keep absorbing all these new customs
and curiosities on Pasio!
ch0284_41_seki/3001_0701_01_10:
When I’m waking up and getting ready,
I can’t waste a single moment!
ch0284_41_seki/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s proper manners to adjust your outfit
to where you’re going—and when!
ch0284_41_seki/3005_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m with you, I feel like I’ve
spent my day well. Thanks!
